```{r setup}
library(lrm)
library(Rcpp)
sourceCpp("~/lrm/Cplusplus/lrm_Cpp.cpp")
```

```{r}
head(iris)
```

```{r}
X.vec <- mtcars$wt
Y <- mtcars$mpg
m <- lrm(Y, X.vec)
lrm.estimate(m)
```

```{r}
summary(lm(mpg~wt, data = mtcars))
```

```{r}
lrm.Ftest(m)
```

```{r}
lrm.GLH(m,matrix(c(0,1),nrow=1,ncol=2))
```

```{r}
contrast.T = matrix(c(0,1),nrow=1, ncol=2)
car::linearHypothesis(model=lm(mpg~wt, data = mtcars), hypothesis.matrix=contrast.T, rhs=c(0))
```
